snippet: The Giants not only weren't surprised by the Falcons' fourth-and-one quarterback sneaks, but they also knew exactly what was coming.
abstract: The Giants not only weren't surprised by the Falcons' fourth-and-one quarterback sneaks, but they also knew exactly what was coming.
lead_paragraph: "Tuesday Morning Quarterback's immutable law of short-yardage holds: Do a Little Dance If You Want to Gain That Yard. Misdirection is the key to short-yardage runs." Gregg Easterbrook, in his TMQ of Nov. 8.

headline.main: Mike Smith's Math Was Good; Atlanta's Execution Needs Work
